name: Black Floral Top
desc: A casual wrap spring fall boho blouse, with a v neck three quarter length cotton fabric.

name: White Trouser
desc: A mid waist/rise. Straight cut jeans.

name: Pink Shoes
desc: A wide fit women's pink shoes, suede style finish with comfortable fit. Perfect to wear from day to night.

name: Flower Hair Accessory
desc: A stretchable hair accessory with flowers perfect for spring and summer.

name: Stripes Croptop
desc: A horizontal stripes croptop, perfect for summer time with ruffle, flattering bardot neckline.

name: Blue Denim Shorts
desc: Short, high-waisted, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim made from organic cotton with hard-worn details. Button fly and sewn-in turn-ups with raw edges at the hems.

name: Tan Sandals
desc: Tan Sandals perfect for summer holiday, a suede sandals with 2 inch heels.

name: Cateye Sunglass
desc: 100% UVA & UVB sunglasses for women with gold detailing on the edge for a more sleek look perfect for summer.

name: Purple Knit Sweater
desc: Pullover Acrylic Cotton top with Vneck and Solid Pattern perfect for Fall and Winter Seasons.

name: Blue Skinny Jeans
desc: In a perennially cool high-waisted fit,skinny jean that we fell in love with all those years ago. Crafted in authentic mid blue cotton blend for our signature soft denim feel, the ankle-grazing style includes multiple pockets, perfect for all occassionsions.

name: Faux Suede Ankle Boots
desc: Perfect for Fall, details a pair of faux suede ankle booties featuring a matte zip-up side, a faux wood block heel, and a slightly pointed toe..

name: Classic Waffle Knit Scarf (Grey)
desc: TearAway adhesive fabric label. Thick waffle knit. Perfect for Cold weathers. Washing Instructions Hand wash only, iron on low heat.

name: Navy Poncho Top
desc: Perfect for Winter, Hip length, a chunky and cable knit with acrylic and wool materials.

name: Ankle length leggings (black)
desc: Our obsession with leggings isn't going anywhere. Invest in new fits and fabrics with our improved pair. Comes in a classic ankle length and quality finish.

name: Dark Brown Longboots
desc: A leather Dark brown Long boots perfect for wet and cold seasons.

name: People Tree Grey Gloves and Hat
desc: Hand knitted in 100% pure wool, and pompoms are from strands of recycled wool for an extra echo touch perfect for winter.
